name: Spicy Tomato And Cherry Pepper Salad
keywords: celery, cherry peppers, tomato, low-sodium, raw
recipeIngredient: 2 large, red ripe tomatoes, about 1 pound
3 tablespoons finely chopped hot cherry peppers, bottled without salt
2 tablespoons finely chopped jalapeno or serrano chilies

recipeInstructions.text: Cut away and discard tomato cores. Cut tomatoes into 1-inch cubes. There should be about 2 1/2 cups.
Put tomatoes in bowl and add remaining ingredients. Stir to blend and serve.
